actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.
Reported to House from the Committee on the Judiciary with amendment, H. Rept. 94-432.
Measure passed House, amended, with an amendment to the title.
Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of the Billings Gazette, the Idaho Statesman, the Independent Record, the Newspaper Agency, Utah State Press Association, Incorporated, Arizona Daily Sun, and Williams News.

summary.text: Provides for the relief of the Billings Gazette, the Idaho Statesman, the Independent Record, the Newspaper Agency, Utah State Press Association, Incorporated, Arizona Daily Sun, and Williams News.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of the Billings Gazette, the Idaho Statesman, the Independent Record, the Newspaper Agency, Utah State Press Association, Incorporated, Arizona Daily Sun, and Williams News.
